task.title: Create Polar Arrays
task.shortdesc: You can specify a center or base point to copy the selected objects to create a polar array. The polar ar ay is drawn clockwise or counterclockwise depending on whether you type a positive or negative value.

context.p: The radius is determined by the distance between the specified center point and a reference or base point on the last selected object.

step.cmd: Choose Modify > Array from the main menu.
In the Array tab, click Polar Array.
Clickthe Select Objects button, and then select objects to array in your drawing.
In the Array dialog box, choose Method and values youdesired.

result.p: To create a polar array, select the object to copy (A), specify the center point of the array (B), and then specify the number of items to the array, the angle the array is to fill, and whether to rotate the items
